original_text: And the Lord said unto Satan, From whence comest thou? And Satan answered the Lord, and said, From going to and fro in the earth, and from walking up and down in it.
korean_text: 여호와께서 사탄에게 이르시되 네가 어디서 왔느냐 사탄이 여호와께 대답하여 이르되 땅을 두루 돌아 여기 저기 다녀 왔나이다

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Satan
And Satan answered the Lord, and said
From going to and fro in the earth
and from walking up and down in it.
